original_title: How Would Jesus Treat the Gay Couple Next Door?
overview: What does it look like to live out the great commandment to "Love thy neighbor as yourself"? Current events drive discussion around what it means to be  nonjudgmental, to live as Jesus did. To nurture friendship and extend a hand to those around us, no matter their circumstance. To extend the grace Jesus gives us to our neighbors.
title: How Would Jesus Treat the Gay Couple Next Door?
